quizzes.name: GLP-1 Weight Loss Intake Form
quizzes.description: Comprehensive medical intake form for GLP-1 weight loss medication

formSteps.title: What is your height and weight? We'll calculate your BMI automatically
What is your goal weight?
formSteps.heading1: We are in this together. Your goal is our goal.
What weight loss initiatives have you tried in the past?

formSteps.subtext: This helps us understand your body complexity and hormones so we can assess you better.

formSteps.title: Do any of these apply to you?

formSteps.heading1: It feels like magic, but it's metabolic science.

questions.quote: I lost 45 pounds in 6 months and feel like a completely different person. This medication changed my life!

formSteps.heading1: How will GLP work for you?

formSteps.title: What is your primary reason for looking into GLP-1 medication?

formSteps.heading1: Are you currently taking any GLP-1 medications?

formSteps.title: How is that pace for you?
formSteps.heading1: With medication, you'll lose {{weeklyLossRange}} pounds per week.
formSteps.dynamicSubtext: It will take about {{timeToGoal}} weeks to reach your goal weight of {{goalWeight}}.
formSteps.subtext: This is an estimate. Individual results may vary.

questions.dynamicSubtext: Losing {{weight-goalWeight}}lbs is easier than you think - and it doesn't involve restrictive diets.
questions.subtext: Now, let's analyze your metabolism and discover how well your body processes macronutrients.

questions.quote: After struggling with my weight for years, I finally found something that works. Down 30 pounds and counting!
I never thought I could feel this confident again. The weight loss has been incredible and sustainable.

formSteps.title: Do any of these apply to you?
formSteps.heading1: GLP-1 is safe, but these health conditions might prevent you from being prescribed.
formSteps.subtext: Your answers are completely confidential and protected by HIPAA

options.label: End-stage kidney disease (on or about to be on dialysis)

options.value: Current suicidal thoughts and/or prior suicidal attempt
options.label: Current suicidal thoughts and/or prior suicidal attempt

options.value: Cancer (active diagnosis, active treatment, or in remission or cancer-free for less than 5 continuous years does not apply to non-melanoma skin cancer that was considered cured via simple excision)
options.label: Cancer (active diagnosis, active treatment, or in remission or cancer-free for less than 5 continuous years does not apply to non-melanoma skin cancer that was considered cured via simple excision)

options.value: History of organ transplant on anti-rejection medication
options.label: History of organ transplant on anti-rejection medication

formSteps.title: Do any of these apply to you?

options.value: Diabetic retinopathy (diabetic eye disease), damage to the optic nerve from trauma or reduced blood flow, or blindness
options.label: Diabetic retinopathy (diabetic eye disease), damage to the optic nerve from trauma or reduced blood flow, or blindness

options.value: Coronary artery disease (narrowing of the heart vessels)
options.label: Coronary artery disease (narrowing of the heart vessels)

options.value: Idiopathic Hypertrophic Subaortic Stenosis (aka hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy)
options.label: Idiopathic Hypertrophic Subaortic Stenosis (aka hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy)

options.value: Any congenital or developmental heart problems
options.label: Any congenital or developmental heart problems

options.value: Pulmonary HTN (a rare condition that refers to the blood vessels to the lungs and isn't the same as high blood pressure)
options.label: Pulmonary HTN (a rare condition that refers to the blood vessels to the lungs and isn't the same as high blood pressure)

formSteps.title: Do you experience any of these symptoms? (Please check off all that apply)

options.value: Chest pain when climbing stairs or walking
options.label: Chest pain when climbing stairs or walking

options.value: Sudden loss of vision due to loss of blood flow to your eye (aka anterior ischemic optic neuropathy)
options.label: Sudden loss of vision due to loss of blood flow to your eye (aka anterior ischemic optic neuropathy)

options.value: Cramping or pain in the calves or legs with exercise (aka claudication)
options.label: Cramping or pain in the calves or legs with exercise (aka claudication)

options.label: Told not to have sex for any reason

options.value: Peyronie's disease or pain with erections
options.label: Peyronie's disease or pain with erections

options.value: Active stomach, intestinal, or bowel ulcers or bleeding
options.label: Active stomach, intestinal, or bowel ulcers or bleeding

options.value: Bleeding disorder (causing you to bleed more easily than is normal)
options.label: Bleeding disorder (causing you to bleed more easily than is normal)

options.value: Multiple sclerosis, paralysis, or spinal cord injury
options.label: Multiple sclerosis, paralysis, or spinal cord injury

options.value: Clotting disorder (you form clots more easily than is normal)
options.label: Clotting disorder (you form clots more easily than is normal)

options.value: Any ALPHA blocker, NOT beta blocker (like Flomax, Cardura, and Minipress)
options.label: Any ALPHA blocker, NOT beta blocker (like Flomax, Cardura, and Minipress)

options.value: Nitroglycerin in any form (spray, tablet, patch, or ointment)
options.label: Nitroglycerin in any form (spray, tablet, patch, or ointment)

options.value: Supplements that boost nitric oxide (like L-arginine, L-citrulline, beet root powder/extract/juice concentrate)
options.label: Supplements that boost nitric oxide (like L-arginine, L-citrulline, beet root powder/extract/juice concentrate)

options.value: Monoket (isosorbide mononitrate), Bidil, or Isordil (isorbide dinitrate), which are commonly prescribed to prevent chest pain caused by heart disease)
options.label: Monoket (isosorbide mononitrate), Bidil, or Isordil (isorbide dinitrate), which are commonly prescribed to prevent chest pain caused by heart disease)

options.value: Antiretrovirals or any treatment for HIV
options.label: Antiretrovirals or any treatment for HIV

formSteps.title: Is there anything else you'd like your provider to know?
Please leave your message to your doctor here.

formSteps.heading1: ED can be a sign of other undiagnosed medical issues, like heart problems.
formSteps.heading2: Smoking, marijuana use, obesity, depression, and low testosterone can all play a role in erectile function (and dysfunction).
formSteps.subtext: In addition to seeking ED treatment, we recommend you speak with your primary care provider to rule out other underlying conditions.

quizzes.name: Hair Growth Treatment Intake Form
quizzes.description: Comprehensive questionnaire for patients seeking hair growth treatments including Finasteride, Minoxidil, and Tretinoin

progressSteps.name: Hair Assessment
progressSteps.description: Hair satisfaction, goals, and loss location

formSteps.title: How satisfied are you with your hair overall?
What are your top-priority goals for hair loss treatment?

options.value: I want to prevent further hair loss
options.label: I want to prevent further hair loss

options.value: I have a full head of hair I'd like to maintain
options.label: I have a full head of hair I'd like to maintain

formSteps.title: Where are you noticing hair loss or thinning?

options.value: Receding hairline (along my forehead or temples)
options.label: Receding hairline (along my forehead or temples)

options.value: Random golf-ball size bald patches scattered all over scalp
options.label: Random golf-ball size bald patches scattered all over scalp

options.value: Nowhere yet, but I'd like to prevent future hair loss
options.label: Nowhere yet, but I'd like to prevent future hair loss

formSteps.title: Have you ever treated your hair loss with medication?
What treatments did you receive?
Please tell us more about your treatment experience (effectiveness, side effects, etc.).
Have you noticed any of the following?

options.value: Pain, soreness, burning, and/or tingling in areas of hair loss
options.label: Pain, soreness, burning, and/or tingling in areas of hair loss

options.value: Recurrent pus bumps or open sores on scalp
options.label: Recurrent pus bumps or open sores on scalp

options.value: Partial or complete loss of eyebrows or eyelashes
options.label: Partial or complete loss of eyebrows or eyelashes

formSteps.title: Have you ever been diagnosed with or treated for high or low blood pressure?

options.value: Yes, I have been diagnosed or treated for high blood pressure
options.label: Yes, I have been diagnosed or treated for high blood pressure

options.value: Yes, I have been diagnosed or treated for low blood pressure
options.label: Yes, I have been diagnosed or treated for low blood pressure

formSteps.title: Do you have, or have you ever had, any of the following conditions?

options.value: Repeated chest pain or tightness, also called angina
options.label: Repeated chest pain or tightness, also called angina

options.value: Coronary artery disease, or narrowing of the heart vessels
options.label: Coronary artery disease, or narrowing of the heart vessels
